Name: Movavi Video Editor 2023
About the game: Games are all about grinding and achieving. Performed a mind-blowing stunt or mastered killing the final boss in one blow? Share your victories with the community! Create catchy Let's Plays and gameplay videos with a fast, streamlined app – Movavi Video Editor. Highlights A new way to track objects using artificial intelligence. Link titles, stickers, or masks to objects in the video AI-powered background removal. Now, the original background doesn’t have to be a solid color. Easily set any backdrop you want AI-driven denoiser. Automatically remove unwanted voices, dogs barking, and other noises from your videos Faster app launch. Make the most of the quick start to dive into video creation right away New music. Now your clips will resonate in a new way Direct upload to TikTok. Share your gameplay videos the minute you’ve created them and get your likes fast New trendy frames. Draw attention to the most action-packed moments in your game Fresh effects sets. Choose from a vast collection of outros and intro videos, titles, stickers, transitions, and backgrounds to create engaging and thrilling Let’s Plays for social networks and video sharing platforms Get your in-game exp ready for showing Save time and make videos automatically Select a pre-set theme or create your own, choose music and transitions, and boom! Your movie is ready to blow up on social media. Edit recorded footage Get full control of the video montage process: cutting, zooming, reversing, color adjustment, and much more. Create your personalized intro and outro to stand out. Make the most of the built-in smarts: instantly swap backgrounds in your clips without a green screen. Adjust sound grabbed from microphone Make the sound more voluminous with the Reverberation tool and remove any background noise using the power of AI. Add atmospheric audio tracks Choose energetic background music and sound effects. Add in gunshots, whips, crashes, applause, and more from our built-in library. Overlay your webcam output Show all your emotions when playing your favorite games – worried, happy, or excited! Create polished video clips Highlight the best moments of your gameplay. Use our AI-powered motion tracking and let everyone follow your video game character. Create dynamic movies with our beat detection function. Supercharge your game reviews with awesome filters, LUTs, frames, and animated overlays, in a single click. Make video game AMVs and funny glitch reels. Own this game? Let everyone know Prepare video game content for contests: save your files in any popular media format. Share Let’s Play videos on YouTube, Vimeo, TikTok, and Google Drive right from the program.
